title: Did Zed Sale Arrive Yet?
body: I just got RP after thinking I wasn't going to but now that I do have some, does anyone recall Zed being on sale yet or is he coming up later?  Not sure if I should buy him asap or wait, but also don't want to waste my time {{champion:238}}

replies.body: Glad you were able to find what you were looking for!  Bookmark our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page as well for upcoming sales too!
Nevermind found out it's in patch notes
